{"step_by_step_thinking": "Renal agenesis is a condition where a baby is born with one or both kidneys missing. The kidneys play a crucial role in producing urine, which contributes to the amniotic fluid surrounding the baby in the womb. If a baby has renal agenesis, especially bilateral, the amount of amniotic fluid can be significantly reduced, leading to a condition known as oligohydramnios.", "answer_choice": "D. Oligohydramnios"}
